column5: Good morning to the north, anyone have a ice/snow report for Thadious lake just bellow LacSeul . A good freind is heading there for opener or should he plan on ice fishing gear. Thanks.

**** be fishing Thaddeus or Ord lakes there possible they will be open as there smaller.lots of potholes there to fish in case there not.sure the camp has portage lakes he could go to for back up plan.
